name: ShortRails
description:
Download the windows desktop version below for better quality !

In ShortRails your goal is to keep the train on rail and make it loop forever.

Controls
  • Change the rails of a tile with left/right click.
  • Remove rails with middle mouse button or space.
  • Escape to give up.
Guide
  • You loose if the train reaches the end of the rails (obviously).
  • You have to come by the train station regularly. If the clock runs out before you do you loose.
  • Avoid tiles occupied by bandits, or it's gameover.
  • You get a **bonus score** multiplier by passing by a tile with a lady.
  • Rails flashing in yellow will change randomly next time the train steps on them.
